1556230.name: Gobs of Glory
1556230.description:
Gobs of Glory - A turn based multiplayer RPG true to the 5e SRD ruleset. For Windows, Mac, Linux.

Outwit your opponents in tactical turn-based PvP and PvE combat. As you win battles your character will gain riches and experience which can be used to level up and buy powerful magical items. At the end of each arena season characters will be richly rewarded by their Incantor based on their rank and Glory!

Features online multiplayer PvP combat as well as PvE solo & co-op modes. Play solo or as a team to develop complex tactics that you can take back to the tabletop for even more Glory!

NOW STARTING OPEN PLAYTESTING!

I'll keep server up as much as possible - If it's down something crashed - please post on the subreddit linked on the right and I'll fix it ASAP. Was going to have planned server uptime but I can't find anyone who wants to play with me anyway ğŸ˜­ I'll just keep them up all the time and hope for the best.

Thanks for helping me playtest and develop Gobs of Glory!
